name: BlackJack C# In Unity 201 project
description:
This was a project I had to make for my Coding elective.

Create a modular Blackjack framework. Luck-based or gambling games are frequently created with a basic set of rules before being "skinned" to attract players by giving the game a new design and maybe additional features. My objective is to develop a framework for blackjack that can be packaged and applied to a variety of different blackjack variations.

I was able to develop and build a self-contained modular framework employing coding best practices now that I have a better knowledge of C# principles, nomenclature, structure, and syntax.
